message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product for a one-time price of $900000. This is a rare chance to acquire a high-value item that will bring significant benefits to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be within my budget.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, and I'm glad you're willing to make a serious offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $775000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I understand that you're close to your budget, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you at $795000, which is a compromise that should work for both of us.
